A4.text: Pitt met actress Jennifer Aniston in 1998; they married in a private wedding ceremony in Malibu on July 29, 2000.

A5.text: Pitt's relationships have also been subject to widespread media attention, particularly his marriages to actresses Jennifer Aniston and Angelina Jolie, the latter of whom he shares six children with.

A6.text: On January 7, 2005, they announced their separation, and finalized their divorce on October 2.

A7.text: During their divorce proceedings, news media speculated that Pitt had been unfaithful to Aniston with his Mr. & Mrs. Smith co-star Angelina Jolie, with whom he began a relationship soon after the split.

A8.text: She was involved in a prominent scandal when she was accused of causing the divorce of actors Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston in October 2005

A9.text: She fell in love with Pitt during the filming of Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2005), but dismissed allegations of an affair

A10.text: Paltrow became engaged in December 1996 to actor Brad Pitt, whom she dated from 1994 to 1997.

A11.text: Sinitta was married from 2002 to 2010 to Andy Willner.
